channel.title: GitHub Fortran Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Fortran in GitHub

item.title: cp2k/cp2k
item.description: Quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package

item.title: earth-system-radiation/rte-rrtmgp
item.description: RTE+RRTMGP is a set of codes for computing radiative fluxes in planetary atmospheres.

item.title: OpenFAST/openfast
item.description: Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.

item.title: esmf-org/esmf
item.description: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.

item.title: GEOS-ESM/MAPL
item.description: MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)

item.title: E3SM-Project/E3SM
item.description: Energy Exascale Earth System Model source code. NOTE: use "maint" branches for your work. Head of master is not validated.
